alex: Hey, have you seen the new girl in our class?
cz_reply: Jo, už jsem ji viděl.
accepted_answers: Yes, I have seen her.
Yes, I’ve seen her.

alex: She’s really cute, right?
cz_reply: Ano, moc se mi líbí.
accepted_answers: Yes, I really like her.
Yeah, I really like her.

alex: Have you talked to her yet?
cz_reply: Ano, mluvil jsem s ní o přestávce.
accepted_answers: Yes, I have talked to her during the break.
I’ve talked to her at the break.

alex: Nice! What have you talked about?
cz_reply: Povídali jsme si o hudbě, kterou máme rádi.
accepted_answers: We have talked about music we like.
We’ve talked about the music we like.

alex: Have you found anything in common?
cz_reply: Ano, oba máme rádi stejnou kapelu.
accepted_answers: Yes, we have liked the same band.
Yes, we’ve liked the same band.

alex: That’s awesome. Has she smiled at you?
cz_reply: Jo, už se na mě několikrát usmála.
accepted_answers: Yeah, she has smiled at me several times.
Yes, she’s smiled at me a few times.

alex: Have you added her on social media?
cz_reply: Ano, přidal jsem si ji na Instagramu.
accepted_answers: Yes, I’ve added her on Instagram.
I have added her on Instagram.

alex: And has she accepted your request?
cz_reply: Jo, přijala to hned.
accepted_answers: Yeah, she has accepted it immediately.
Yes, she’s accepted it right away.

alex: Have you sent her a message?
cz_reply: Ano, napsal jsem jí včera večer.
accepted_answers: Yes, I have sent her a message last night.
I’ve messaged her last night.

alex: Has she replied already?
cz_reply: Ano, odpověděla a byla moc milá.
accepted_answers: Yes, she has replied and was very nice.
She has already replied and was very sweet.

alex: Bro, you’ve made some serious progress!
cz_reply: Díky, mám z toho fakt radost.
accepted_answers: Thanks, I’m really happy about it.
I’m really glad about it.

alex: Have you asked her what she likes doing?
cz_reply: Ano, ptal jsem se jí, co má ráda.
accepted_answers: Yes, I have asked her what she likes.
I’ve asked her what she likes to do.

alex: And what has she said?
cz_reply: Řekla, že má ráda procházky a čtení.
accepted_answers: She has said she likes walks and reading.
She’s told me she likes walking and reading.

alex: Sounds perfect. Have you suggested doing something together?
cz_reply: Ano, navrhl jsem, že bychom mohli jít ven.
accepted_answers: Yes, I have suggested going out together.
I’ve suggested we could go out.

alex: How has she reacted?
cz_reply: Řekla, že by ráda šla na procházku v pátek.
accepted_answers: She has said she’d like to go for a walk on Friday.
She’s told me she wants to go for a walk on Friday.

alex: Dude, that’s a date already!
cz_reply: Jo, nikdy jsem nebyl tak nervózní.
accepted_answers: Yeah, I’ve never been this nervous.
I have never felt this nervous.

alex: Have you picked a place to go?
cz_reply: Ano, vybral jsem park u řeky.
accepted_answers: Yes, I’ve picked the park near the river.
I have chosen the park by the river.

alex: You’ve really thought this through.
cz_reply: Chtěl jsem, aby to bylo hezké a klidné.
accepted_answers: I’ve wanted it to be nice and quiet.
I wanted it to be peaceful and beautiful.

alex: Have you told anyone else about it?
cz_reply: Ne, ty jsi první, komu to říkám.
accepted_answers: No, you’re the first person I’ve told.
No, you’re the only one I’ve told.

alex: Bro, I’m proud of you. You’ve taken the first big step.
cz_reply: Díky, kámo. Vážím si toho.
accepted_answers: Thanks, bro. I really appreciate it.
Thank you, man. I appreciate that.

alex: Good luck on Friday! You’ve got this!
cz_reply: Díky, dám ti potom vědět, jaké to bylo.
accepted_answers: Thanks, I’ll let you know how it went.
I’ll tell you how it went later.
